::DrillBit::

"I think you have thought this out good. Attack from the air, to ratte
them. Attack frontle, to distract, and kill. And enter through the vent
shafts, and kill them from the inside. I like." He said, with a smile.
He walked up behind her.
"You know what els I like...?" He said, kissing her neck.
